attributes.comment:
My husband and I are in the process of adopting an abandoned orphan child from
the Country of China. Adoption costs are already very expensive. I am writing to
let you know that we strongly oppose the proposed increase in fees for orphan
petitions. We feel the fees should actually be decreased for adoptions. And, the
adoption wait time has increased to nearly 2 years. Because of this, we now have
to file more than once (2 to 3 times) paying double or triple the cost of the I-600A.
This is a significant financial hardship. We respectfully request that this Bill
EXCLUDE or waive any fee increases which would be applicable to ADOPTION
related activities (international and domestic).
Thank you very much for your consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Suzanne Martin-Hoerner
